name: GiantBombVideoGameReleases
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
When you enable this skill, the latest video games added to the Giant Bomb game library will be listed along with a short description of each game.

The full game library can be seen here- https://www.giantbomb.com/games/
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
